testcase.classname: Validation of Login Page in Adactin Web Page
testcase.name: Tc01_Validation of Login Page with Valid Username and Valid Password
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Adactin Web Page..........................................passed Then User Verifies Adactin Web Page Is Displayed............................passed When User Enters Valid "Nolan425" and Valid "Karthik425@"...................passed And User Clicks Login Button................................................passed Then User Verify Serch Hotel Page is Displayed..............................passed When User Selects Valid "<Location>","<HotelName>","<HotelType>","<NoOfRooms>","13/02/2022","15/02/2022","<AdultsPerRooms>","<ChildrenPerRoom>".passed And User Clicks Serch Button................................................passed Then User Verify Adactin Select Hotel Page Is Displayed.....................passed When User Clicks Radio Button and Continue Button...........................passed Then User Verify Adactin Book a Hotel Page Is Displayed.....................passed When User Enters Valid "Nolan","John","Doorno-456,SouthRoad,Delhi"..........passed When User Entres Valid "9876564789765345",Card Type,ExpMonth,ExpYear and "456".passed And User Clicks Book Now Button.............................................passed Then User Verify Order ID is Displayed......................................passed
